description: Separate any table in the request and include the keywords and parameters that apply to that table.

tables.description: A list tables to be searched with their parameters.

name.description: Name of the table if mentioned in the request, use 'Not specified' otherwise.

parameters.description: The parameters to search for in this table.

keyword.description: The keyword to search for in this table, excluding the table name itself.

foreign_table.description: Name of the foreign table to join with, if applicable.

foreign_table_parameters.description: The parameters to search for in the foreign table.

keyword.description: The keyword to search for in this foreign table, excluding the table name itself.
